articles.title: KPA Panmunjom Mission Discloses U.S. Criminal Abuse of Cheonan Warship Sinking for Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
KPA Panmunjom Mission Discloses U.S. Criminal Abuse of Cheonan Warship Sinking for Hostile Policy toward DPRK
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The Panmunjom mission of the Korean People's Army released an indictment Tuesday exposing the U.S. criminal act of cooking up the Cheonan warship sinking case and abusing it for stepping up its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal that engineered the case by instigating the south Korean puppet forces, the indictment said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S., which had repeated plots to save its policy for invading the DPRK and its pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy from crises and give a shot in the arm of its colonial stooges, concluded that it needed a shocking case.
					
					 Accordingly, the U.S. imperialist aggression forces command in Pacific held a confab with stooges of the "Institute for National Defense Studies" and the "Pacific Strategy Institute" of south Korea and suddenly launched the joint naval drills in waters off the five islands in the West Sea where tensions between the north and the south constantly ran high.
					
					 According to the scenario worked out by the U.S. in top secret, the Cheonan warship sank at night on March 26, 2010, leaving 46 puppet army soldiers dead.
					
					 It was orchestrated by the U.S. out of its sinister intention to hold control of south Korea and Japan, use them as a shock brigade in realizing its ambition for world domination and intensify the moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK after securing justifications for arms buildup in the region.
					
					 A typical example was the scientific clarification made by competent naval military experts of the Russian Pacific Fleet of the fact that the warship sank by a special torpedo from a smaller diving apparatus launched by the nuclear-powered submarine of the U.S. forces, not by a "torpedo of the north."  
					
					 The indictment also exposed that the U.S. has persistently stood in the way of a fair probe into the truth about the case. It continued:
					
					 The U.S. brought to rupture the colonel-level working contacts between the militaries of the DPRK and the U.S. in Panmunjom that were held on seven occasions from July 15 to October 27, 2010 for the probe into the truth behind the case.
					
					 The indictment termed the U.S. a backstage wire-puller that instigated the south Korean puppet forces to cook up a story about "the north's attack."
					
					 The U.S. didn't hesitate to run the whole gamut of base acts to put under carpet the fabrication of the warship sinking case, it noted, adding:
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that the U.S. egged the south Korean puppet forces on to spread the story of "north's attack" and asserted it was an established fact that the north was a suspect, claiming that "there were almost no other suspects except for north Korea" and "the warship sank by a torpedo attack of north Korea." 
					
					 While egging the puppet forces on to stage a farce "proving" the story about "the north's torpedo attack," the U.S. got zealous in building up public opinion to justify it.
					
					 The indictment branded the U.S. as hordes of warmongers who abused the warship sinking case for its moves for invading the DPRK.
					
					 No sooner had the case occurred than the U.S. pushed the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a war, getting frantic with its war racket targeting the DPRK, it said and continued:
					
					 Right after the "results of investigation" peppered with sheer lies were published on May 20, 2010, Obama instructed the U.S. Department of Defense and Joint Chiefs of Staff to make thorough military preparations to "cope with future invasion by north Korea."
					
					 Pursuant to it, U.S. warships sailed into the West Sea of Korea and largest-ever joint submarine, naval mobile, air mobile and naval landing drills and other joint maneuvers of various forms were staged almost every day.
					
					 Arms buildup and deployment of forces were stepped up according to the conversion of the command of the U.S. Eighth Army into the "one for executing a war."
					
					 War servants of the U.S. were busy visiting south Korea and Japan, where they were loudmouthed about "very dangerous situation on the Korean peninsula" and held confabs for tightening the military alliance for aggression among the U.S., Japan and south Korea to cope with contingency on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. zealously hurled war maniacs of the south Korean puppet military into reckless military provocations to escalate confrontation with compatriots in the north.
					
					 The U.S. scenario to abuse the warship sinking case for laying a siege for international "sanctions" against the DPRK was executed at an ever more serious phase.
					
					 The U.S. should admit before the Korean nation and the world public its criminal fabrication of the case and abuse of it for carrying out its hostile policy toward the DPRK and escalating confrontation between Koreans and make an apology for them, though belatedly.

articles.title: Greetings to Greek President
articles.content:
Greetings to Greek President
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Prokopis Pavlopoulos, president of Greece, on its national day.
					 The message wished the Greek people prosperity and well-being.

articles.title: Day of Pakistan Marked
articles.content:
Day of Pakistan Marked
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Pakistani Ambassador to the DPRK Syed Hasan Habib gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Wednesday on the Day of Pakistan.
					 Present there on invitation were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of External Economic Relations, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, officials concerned, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of missions of international organizations here.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: World Water Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
World Water Day Marked in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- An event on the theme of "Water and sustainable development" took place at the Grand People's Study House Wednesday on the occasion of World Water Day.
					 Present there were officials of the Ministry of Urban Management, Ministry of Public Health, State Academy of Sciences, Grand People's Study House and other officials concerned, the acting representative and members of the UNICEF here.
					
					 Speakers referred to the world's serious water crisis blamed on various factors including the rapid growth of population and climate change caused by global warming.
					
					 The protection of water resources is an important issue for human existence and development, they said, calling for showing deep concern for saving water. 
					
					 A Lecture was given under the title "Water and sustainable development".
					
					 That day the participants looked round gravity-fed waterworks built in Unjon County, North Phyongan Province with the cooperation of the UNICEF.

articles.title: Spring Young RC Volunteers' Tree-planting Event Held
articles.content:
Spring Young RC Volunteers' Tree-planting Event Held
Kaechon, March 25 (KCNA) -- An event of young Red Cross volunteers for spring tree-planting was held in Kaechon City, South Phyongan Province on Wednesday on the occasion of the spring period of the general mobilization for land management.
					 Present there were officials and members of the DPRK Red Cross Society, young RC volunteers and other volunteers, officials concerned, members of the delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and the delegation of the International Committee of the Red Cross working in the DPRK and foreign diplomatic envoys here.
					
					 Planting trees, the participants talked about planting trees by agro-forestry management and the role to be played by young RC volunteers in turning the whole country into green woods.
					
					 Spring tree planting will go on till April 30 across the country.

articles.title: Birthday Party Given for Participants of National Meeting of Sportspersons
articles.content:
Birthday Party Given for Participants of National Meeting of Sportspersons
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A birthday party was given for participants of the 7th National Meeting of Sportspersons at the April 25 Hotel Wednesday.
					 Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, addressed the party.
					
					 He said that Marshal Kim Jong Un who is always paying deep attention to the development of the country's sports made sure that the 7th National Meeting of Sportspersons was convened and the birthday party was given for the participants on their birthdays during the meeting.
					
					 He called upon officials and sportspersons to devote themselves to successfully implementing the party's plan to put the country's dignity on the position of the dignified sports power in near years by bringing about the revolutionary turn in the physical culture true to the historic letter of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Gives Priority to Science and Technology
articles.content:
DPRK Gives Priority to Science and Technology
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The Sci-Tech Complex and Mirae Scientists Street are now being built at a fast tempo on the scenic bank of the Taedong River in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK. 
					 Their construction gives a glimpse of the DPRK's policy of attaching importance to science and technology.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un has made a new history of giving priority to the nation's development of science and technology, with the noble idea that there will be no rosy future without science.
					
					 In January last year he visited the State Academy of Sciences, calling on the scientists and technicians to make tangible contributions to the prosperity of the country. And he took measures to build a modern scientist street in the Unjong science area and a scientist holiday camp near scenic Lake Yonphung.
					
					 Under his loving care, a lot of edifices for the scientists and technicians have taken their shapes in the country in recent years, such as Unha Scientists Street, apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University and Kim Chaek University of Technology and modern science institutes.
					
					 Encouraged by the supreme leader's idea of giving priority to science, all the scientists and technicians in the DPRK have turned out in a dynamic drive to break through the cutting edge and turn the country into a knowledge-based economic power.

articles.title: E-book "Bullocho", Guide to Mushroom
articles.content:
E-book "Bullocho", Guide to Mushroom
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- E-book "Bullocho", guide to mushroom, is gaining popularity in the DPRK.
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un highly appreciated the book, when giving field guidance to the Pyongyang City Mushroom Farm in January this year. 
					
					The e-book made by Kim Il Sung University deals in detail with more than 2,650 varieties of mushrooms growing in and around Korea and advanced technologies for cultivating mushroom.
					
					 Edited in the book are also photo-accompanied recipes for over 90 kinds of Korean mushroom dishes and at least 250 kinds of foreign mushroom dishes.

articles.title: Home-made Goods Gain Popularity in DPRK
articles.content:
Home-made Goods Gain Popularity in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The sales of home-made consumer goods are gradually increasing in the DPRK.
					 According to Jong Myong Ok, manager of the Pyongyang Department Store No. 1, most of its customers have demanded domestic products rather than imported ones as they are cheap and better in quality. Those products include foodstuffs, cosmetics, medicines and garments.
					
					 Hong Yong Jun, a staff at the Kyonghung Guidance Bureau, said that the output of foodstuffs at factories under the bureau has drastically increased, with their quality remarkably improved.
					
					 In recent years a large number of light industrial establishments in the country have striven to raise the quality and competitive power of their products through a brisk modernization drive.

articles.title: DPRK Not Pressed for Time: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
DPRK Not Pressed for Time: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Koreans in the U.S. had their open letter to Obama carried as a full-page ad on the New York Times, sparking off a great sensation in the U.S. and other parts of the world.
					 Recalling that Obama committed himself to improving relations with "the countries on bad terms" with the U.S. through dialogue and negotiations during the presidential election campaign, the letter noted that they were very disappointed later by his north Korea policy called "strategic patience." It urged Obama to fulfill his commitment by rolling back his "strategic patience policy" which calls for increasing the possibility of a war on the Korean peninsula and conclude a peace treaty to mend the relations with the DPRK.
					
					 This can be viewed as a just demand reflecting the stark reality.
					
					 Now that the "strategic patience policy" enforced by the Obama administration toward the DPRK has already gone bankrupt, the policy is being branded as a "strategically failed policy" even in the U.S.
					
					 Until when will Obama waste time with his patience policy? There is no enough time. -- this was a caution given by the Koreans in the U.S. in their open letter.
					
					 As already known, Obama openly cried out for "collapse of north Korea" at the beginning of the year. One cannot but ask how the guy styling himself president of a "big power" can unhesitatingly talk such nonsense.
					
					 He might have talked such rubbish, being stupefied and bereft of reason in face of the single-minded unity of the DPRK. 
					
					 The open letter referred to the fact that no force can browbeat the DPRK where all the service personnel and people are firmly united.
					
					 It noted:
					
					 "There is another factor called the Juche idea that contributes to the unity of the north. It is the dominating philosophy whereby the people in the north regard their society as an organic body. In actuality, the Juche idea served as another engine for the government in the north to survive for the past seven decades despite the U.S. hostility toward it."
					
					 Why does Obama neither see nor understand the reality of the DPRK where all the service personnel and people achieved the single-minded unity rare to be seen in the world and are dashing ahead like the wind despite all difficulties, guided by the Juche idea and the Songun idea although it is being recognized not only by Koreans in the U.S. but by other people in the world.
					
					 Disregard of reality and escapism are little short of a suicide.
					
					 There is another reality that the U.S. denies.
					
					 It is that Washington has persistently refused to officially recognize the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The DPRK has already declared before the world that it would take the road of further bolstering up its nuclear deterrent against the ever more undisguised hostile moves of the enemy, whether the U.S. and others recognize it as a nuclear weapons state or not.
					
					 The DPRK has no reason to make haste but the U.S. is pressed for time.
					
					 The open letter clarified that persistent provocations against the north making its nukes smaller and developing missile technology might result in throwing even the U.S. mainland into a pitfall of mass destruction.
					
					 The commander of the U.S. Strategic Command who controls the U.S. nuclear forces on March 20 said "north Korea might have already succeeded in making nuclear weapons smaller." This is little short of recognizing the DPRK's bolstering of nuclear deterrent in actuality.
					
					 It is none other than the Obama administration which is pressed for time.
					
					 A Korean adage says that one falls between two stools.
					
					 The U.S. should make one of the two options: peace or war.
					
					 Time is on the side of the DPRK just as victory is always in store for it.
					
					 The Obama administration should bear this in mind and stop at once the DPRK-targeted joint military drills, to begin with, and terminate all its hostile acts against the DPRK.

articles.title: Minju Joson Warns S. Korean Authorities of Their Anti-DPRK Leaflet-scattering
articles.content:
Minju Joson Warns S. Korean Authorities of Their Anti-DPRK Leaflet-scattering
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Human scum in south Korea are posing increasing threat to the north five years since the Cheonan warship sinking incident, a hideous fabrication. They have prepared hundreds of thousands of leaflets and thousands of USBs and DVDs and are waiting for a chance to scatter them over areas of the DPRK by drone. They even blustered that they would stage anti-DPRK leaflet-scattering operations next month together with U.S. human rights tricksters.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The south Korean authorities have so far connived and shielded such operations under the pretext of "nature of social system" and "freedom of expression" and hurled police into scenes of operations to protect their "safety." They, at the same time, cracked down on the people in their struggle against leaflet-scattering operations.
					
					 They have provided a large amount of funds to human scum for such operations, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The human scum, who have become so arrogant under the zealous patronage of the puppet forces, are directly getting in touch with their American master for anti-DPRK leaflet-scattering operations, disregarding Chongwadae and the Ministry of Unification.
					
					 They are now blustering that they will scatter anti-DPRK leaflets no matter what the authorities may say.
					
					 The DPRK will never allow the human scum to mock at the destiny of the fellow countrymen.
					
					 That was why the revolutionary armed forces strongly warned the puppet forces against their acts of egging human scum on to conduct anti-DPRK leaflet-scattering operations. The puppet authorities would be fully accountable for the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by such operations.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying Songun Korea as Sports Powerhouse
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Glorifying Songun Korea as Sports Powerhouse
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday editorially hails the 7th National Meeting of Sportspersons to be opened here.
					 Sports are an important state affair which demonstrates the country's dignity, spirit and national power, the editorial says, adding:
					
					 It is only sportspersons that fly the national flag after winning victories in world arena in peacetime. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung formed an organization of sportspersons of new Korea and convened the 1st Meeting of Sportspersons. Since the founding of the state they have performed great feats for the party and the leader, the country and its people. 
					
					 The proud history of Juche-oriented sports is brilliantly recorded with shining victories and exploits of sportspersons as they have exalted the honor of the DPRK by winning gold medals in games to demonstrate the dignity of the country and the nation.
					
					 Every victory and success won by sportspersons proved to be incomparably tremendous might in inspiring the Korean people to fully display mental power to weather all tests of history under the guidance of the great leaders and great party. They are still powerfully encouraging them in their drive for building a thriving nation.  
					
					 Under the energetic leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the Juche-oriented sports are greeting a new heyday.
					
					 It is the firm determination of the party to turn the country into a sports powerhouse as early as possible.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all officials in the field of sports and sportspersons to turn the DPRK into the world's sports powerhouse by displaying indomitable mental power and ability to win one victory after another, regarding the meeting as a springboard for making leap forward.

articles.title: Nuclear War Maniacs Will Meet Final Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Nuclear War Maniacs Will Meet Final Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The army commander of the general command of the U.S. forces in the Pacific recently said the range and accuracy of the missiles of north Korea are improving and its long-range missiles are posing a substantial threat to the U.S. mainland even though it is hard to assess the north's capability to combine missiles with nuclear weapons.
					 The U.S. bellicose forces are trying to make the story of "threat" sound plausible while spreading their own prediction that the DPRK will possess 100 nuclear weapons in a few years to come despite their previous blustering that they cannot recognize the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 An article of Rodong Sinmun Wednesday notes that it is the height of shamelessness and impudence that the nuclear war maniacs and hideous nuclear criminals are vociferating about "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 Had they approached the DPRK's peace efforts with sincerity and stopped pursuing their hostile policy toward the DPRK and moves for a war of aggression, tension would have been defused and a bright prospect opened for ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 But the peace proposals made by the DPRK have not been realized and the situation on the peninsula has been deteriorated with each passing day. This is entirely attributable to the U.S. which does not want detente and peace on the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. warmongers have described the madcap joint military exercises in south Korea as "defensive" and "legitimate" for decades but this is nothing but sophism.
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises are clearly targeted against the DPRK.
					
					 The warmongers contend they have no alternative but to hold military drills, while vociferating about the fictitious "threats" from the DPRK.
					
					 However, they should bear in mind that they are sadly mistaken if they calculate they can solve any problem through military threats.
					
					 They should clearly know that their reckless nuclear war moves will bring them nothing but a final ruin.

articles.title: Falsity of "Results of Investigation" into Cheonan Warship Sinking Case Exposed
articles.content:
Falsity of "Results of Investigation" into Cheonan Warship Sinking Case Exposed
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- Dr. Yang Phan Sok of Manitoba University of Canada had an interview with a south Korean medium on March 17 on the lapse of five years since the Cheonan warship was sunken. He exposed the falsity of the "results of investigation" announced by the south Korean puppet authorities.
					 He said that white substance discovered in the warship hull and torpedo splinters were hydroxide that does not form in high-temperature environment of explosion.
					
					 The south Korean authorities misused the word "scientific" to threaten those who raised questions about the "results of investigation", he said, ridiculing their assertion as unscientific. 
					
					 He said that the "results of investigation" by the joint investigation group were false.

articles.title: KCTU Calls for Launching General Strike
articles.content:
KCTU Calls for Launching General Strike
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a rally in Sokrisan, North Chungchong Province on March 20 at which it said it would launch a general strike to end the unpopular rule of the puppet forces, according to the south Korean paper Nodong and Segye.
					 The chairman of the KCTU in a speech denounced the Park Geun Hye regime for endangering the vital rights of the workers in league with big businesses.
					
					 He noted that the KCTU would stage actions with people from all walks of life.
					
					 Other speakers said they would wage dynamic actions in provinces and cities and at worksites to force Park Geun Hye to step down and build a world where the workers and other people are well-off.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Peru
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian preparatory committee for celebrating the 103rd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Lima on March 18. 
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events praising the sacred revolutionary career and the undying exploits of the President on the occasion of his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised in Benin, Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised in Benin, Nigeria
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A joint meeting, photo exhibition and film shows took place in Benin and Nigeria on March 17 and 18 with the approach of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display at the venue of the photo exhibition were photos documenting his revolutionary career and undying exploits. 
					
					 Also displayed there were photos showing successes achieved by the service personnel and people of the DPRK in building a thriving nation and the true picture of Songun Korea. 
					
					 "The Tower of the Juche Idea", "The Arch of Triumph" and other Korean films were shown at the film shows. 
					
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin national preparatory committee for celebrating the 103rd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, praised him as the prominent leader who built the DPRK into a socialist power with independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in national defence.
					
					 Pascal Zouncheme, secretary general of the above-said Benin national preparatory committee, said that the President devoted his all to the people, regarding believing in them as in Heaven as his motto all his life. 
					
					 Though the President passed away, his idea and cause are always shining like the sun, the secretary general noted.
					
					 Nigerian personages of the Franoson Mannyon International Company LTD. and a foodstuff company in Lagos said that the President founded the Juche idea, Songun idea and organized the anti-Japanese armed struggle to achieve the historic cause of liberating Korea. They praised the validity and vitality of the immortal Juche idea which indicates the way for the human cause of independence. 
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the joint meeting held in Benin.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Honored in Denmark
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Honored in Denmark
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A Danish preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Copenhagen on March 20. 
					 H. Jacobsen, member of the leadership of the Communist Party in Denmark, and Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the sacred revolutionary career and the immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Uganda
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Uganda
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- A Ugandan national preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed with due ceremony in Kampala on March 19. 
					 Kirunda Kivejinja, senior adviser to the president of Uganda, was elected adviser to the preparatory committee and Henri Masico, department director of the Presidency of Uganda, its chairman.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events including a meeting, seminar and photo exhibition to praise the immortal exploits of the President on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by British Organization
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its internet homepage the full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Kimilsungia Is an Immortal Flower Blooming in the Hearts of Humankind in the Era of Independence" on March 19. 
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 94 (2005), says that immortal Kimilsungia is the flower of the sun symbolizing the greatness of President Kim Il Sung who indicated the ways for the world people with rays of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Int'l Preparatory Committee for Celebrating Day of Sun Formed
articles.content:
Int'l Preparatory Committee for Celebrating Day of Sun Formed
Pyongyang, March 25 (KCNA) -- An international preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed. 
					 A decision on the formation of the preparatory committee was issued by the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions on March 18. 
					
					 The preparatory committee with Mikhail Panchenko, general secretary of the above-said International Alliance, and Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, as co-chairmen includes heads of organizations for the study of the Juche idea from different countries including Belarus and Kazakhstan, according to the decision. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold diverse events such as seminar praising the undying feats of the President and widely introduce the immortal exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un in the East European and Central Asian countries.

articles.title: Representacion del EPC en Phanmunjom publica acta de acusacion sobre caso de "Cheonan"
articles.content:
Representacion del EPC en Phanmunjom publica acta de acusacion sobre caso de "Cheonan"
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- La Representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom hizo publica el dia 24 un acta de acusacion para revelar y denunciar los crimenes abominables de Estados Unidos que fabrico y abuso del incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan" en su campana hostil a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					EE.UU. es el autor principal que fabrico el incidente instigando a los titeres surcoreanos, comienza el acta y prosigue:
					
					Al cabo de sus reiterados debates para eludir el fracaso de su politica agresiva contra la RPDC y estrategia de dar importancia a Asia-Pacifico y para alentar a su lacayo colonial caido en aprieto, EE.UU. saco la conclusion de que se debe fabricar algun incidente sensacional.
					
					Segun esa decision, la comandancia de las fuerzas norteamericanas en el Pacifico sostuvo una conspiracion con los lacayos del "instituto de defensa nacional" del Sur de Corea y otros organos y desarrollo de repente los ejercicios combinados maritimos en las aguas de 5 islas del Mar Oeste de Corea en que ambas partes coreanas estan en agudo enfrentamiento
					
					Segun el guion trazado en supersecreto por EE.UU., ocurrio por la noche del dia 26 de marzo de 2010 el hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan" de que fueron victimas 46 soldados del ejercito surcoreano.
					
					Este accidente fue un invento de EE.UU. que pretendio usar el Sur de Corea y Japon como brigadas de choque en la realizacion de su ambicion de tomar la heguemonia mundial y recrudecer la campana de aislamiento y aplastamiento contra la RPDC al procurar el pretexto y justificacion del aumento armamentista en esta region.
					
					Hasta los competentes especialistas de la Flota del Pacifico de Rusia opinaron con argumentos cientificos que "Cheonan" sumergio no por el "ataque del torpedo del Norte (RPDC)" sino por el torpedo especial lanzado por un submarino nuclear de EE.UU. usando un pequeno aparato sumergible.
					
					EE.UU. impidio obstinadamente el esclarecimiento imparcial del incidente de "Cheonan".
					
					El papel obstructor de EE.UU. se ha conocido en todo el proceso del contacto de trabajo del circulo militar RPDC-EE.UU., sostenido 7 veces a nivel de coronel en Phanmunjom desde el 15 de julio hasta el 27 de octubre de 2010 para el esclarecimiento.
					
					EE.UU. fue el que instigo por detras a los titeres surcoreanos a inventar el rumor de la "obra del Norte".
					
					Recurrio a las sucias artimanas de toda indole para ocultar su acto criminal de haber fraguado el accidente de "Cheonan".
					
					Mientras los titeres surcoreanos circulaban en la opinion publica el rumor de la "obra del Norte" segun la indicacion de EE.UU., este pais trato de tildar a la RPDC de sospechosa diciendo que "no hay casi el otro sospechoso sino el Norte de Corea" y el "hundimiento fue causado por el ataque de torpedo norcoreano".
					
					Al paralelo de la farsa para "comprobar" ese rumor, EE.UU. se dedico a la creacion de opiniones que pudieran justificarlo.
					
					EE.UU. es el colectivo de belicistas que abuso del incidente en sus maniobras agresivas contra la RPDC.
					
					Tan pronto como ocurriera el hundimiento, recrudecio la campana de guerra y agresion contra la RPDC llevando al borde de guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					En cuanto se publicara el 20 de mayo de 2010 el "resultado de investigacion" penetrado de fraudes, Obama instruyo al Pentagono y la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor que hagan todos los preparativos militares para "disuadir la futura agresion proveniente del Norte de Corea".
					
					Segun sus instrucciones, los buques de guerra del imperialismo norteamericano irrumpieron en el Mar Oeste de Corea y se libraron casi todos los dias los ejercicios militares conjuntos de diferentes misiones como los de submarinos de mayor dimension en la historia, las maniobras de traslado en el mar y el cielo y de desembarco.
					
					Se han desplegado en el terreno mucho mas fuerzas armadas debido a que la comandancia del 8o ejercito de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas se convirtio en la "de cumplimiento de guerra".
					
					Los sirvientes de guerra de EE.UU. frecuentaron al Sur de Corea y Japon para pregonar "la muy peligrosa situacion de la Peninsula Coreana" y debatir el fortalecimiento de la alianza militar tripartita frente al tiempo de emergencia de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					EE.UU. empujo a los belicistas del circulo militar surcoreano a las provocaciones militares contra la parte connacional.
					
					Se torno grave la campana de EE.UU. para abusar del incidente de "Cheonan" en el establecimiento de la red de "sancion" internacional contra la RPDC.
					
					Aunque ya es tarde, EE.UU. debe confesar y pedir disculpas a la nacion coreana y al mundo por su crimen de haber fraguado el incidente de "Cheonan" y abusado del mismo en el cumplimiento de su politica hostil anti-RPDC.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente griego
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente griego
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 25 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Grecia, Prokopis Pavlopoulos, con motivo del dia nacional de este pais europeo.
					En su misiva, el remitente deseo al pueblo griego la prosperidad y el bienestar.

articles.title: Se aumenta en Corea el volumen de ventas de productos nacionales
articles.content:
Se aumenta en Corea el volumen de ventas de productos nacionales
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- Estan llenos de productos nacionales los mostradores de las tiendas coreanas.
					En exclusiva con la ACNC, la directora del Almacen No. 1 de Pyongyang, Jong Myong Ok, dijo como sigue:
					
					En estos anos, crecen las demandas sobre los articulos hechos en la industria ligera del pais que se mejoran notablemente en todos los indices como calidad, cantidad, marca y embalaje.
					
					Son de fabricacion nacional la mayoria de alimentos y cosmeticos en venta.
					
					Los muebles, materiales de construccion, medicamentos, zapatos, ropas y otros productos nacionales son baratos y convienen al gusto del pueblo coreano.
					
					Kim Hye Yong, directora de la Fabrica de Cosmeticos de Sinuiju, dijo que los productos de marca "Pomhyanggi" de su fabrica no tenian rivales en el pais, pero ultimamente se eleva la popularidad de los cosmeticos "Unhasu" de la Fabrica de Cosmeticos de Pyongyang.
					
					Otras entidades homologas como la Fabrica de Cosmeticos de Myohyang desafian tambien a la supremacia de nuestra fabrica y esto nos exige redoblar los esfuerzos, apunto.
					
					Hong Yong Jun, funcionario de la Direccion Kyonghung, expreso que no es facil cubrir las crecientes demandas sobre los alimentos que se producen en las bases de industria ligera de distintas localidades. 
					
					Hare mucho aporte a la mejora de la vida del pueblo al renovar la tecnica productiva y el diseno de productos, prometio.
					
					Los funcionarios del Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung y la Fabrica de Aparatos de Automatizacion de Hamhung decidieron satisfacer las demandas del pueblo con los articulos quimicos y electronicos de buena calidad.
					
					Los exitos del sector de industria ligera, que aumenta el volumen de ventas, estimulan a los trabajadores de otras ramas de economia nacional que estan empenados en elevar la calidad y la competitividad de sus productos.

articles.title: ACNC exige a Obama abandonar politica hostil a la RPDC
articles.content:
ACNC exige a Obama abandonar politica hostil a la RPDC
Pyongyang, 25 de marzo (ACNC) -- Hace poco, los coreanos residentes en Estados Unidos publicaron en el periodico The New York Times su carta abierta dirigida al presidente estadounidense Obama, lo que produjo gran sensacion tanto en EE.UU. como en el resto del mundo.
					Durante su campana de las elecciones presidenciales, Obama prometio que si el mismo fuera elegido como presidente, se esforzaria por mejorar mediante el dialogo y las negociaciones las relaciones con los "paises malos", recuerda el mensaje y subraya que las personas quedaron muy consternadas ante la politica sobre la RPDC, o sea, la "paciencia estrategica".
					
					Por ultimo la carta exige a Obama quedar fiel a su promesa electoral, al cambiar ahora mismo su "politica de paciencia estrategica" que permite aumentar la posibilidad de la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y al mejorar las relaciones con la RPDC firmando el convenio de la paz.
					
					Es una demanda justa que refleja la realidad.
					
					La "politica de paciencia estrategica" de la administracion Obama sobre la RPDC es calificada hasta en EE.UU. como una "politica estrategicamente fracasada".
					
					Los coreanos en EE.UU. insinuaron en su carta que no hay mas tiempo para esperar con paciencia.
					
					Como conocen todos, Obama hablo en publico a principios del presente ano sobre el "derrumbe del Norte de Corea", pero, sus palabras no pasan de ser una queja de quien perdio el juicio ante el poderio de la unidad monolitica de la RPDC.
					
					La carta refiere que nadie puede atentar a la RPDC cuyo ejercito y pueblo estan unidos compactamente y prosigue:
					
					"El otro elemento que contribuye a la unidad del Norte es la idea Juche segun la cual los norcoreanos consideran su sociedad como un cuerpo organico. Precisamente con esta idea, el poder del Norte sobrevivio durante 70 anos a pesar de la hostilidad de EE.UU."
					
					Tanto los coreanos en EE.UU. como el mundo entero reconocen ahora la realidad de la RPDC que con el poderio de la idea Juche, la del Songun, logro la unidad monolitica nunca vista en otros paises y marcha con vigor atravesando todas las dificultades. Pero, ?Por que solo Obama no quiere verla ni saberla?
					
					Dar espalda a la realidad es un acto suicida.
					
					EE.UU. se niega persistentemente a reconocer oficialmente el hecho de que la RPDC es el pais poseedor de armas nucleares.
					
					La RPDC declaro ya a todo el mundo que centuplicara su disuasivo nuclear, espada autodefensiva, para hacer frente a las maniobras  hostiles de los enemigos.
					
					No tenemos prisa sino la tiene EE.UU.
					
					La carta expone claramente  que "el Norte minimiza poco a poco las armas nucleares y mejora la tecnologia de misil. En este momento, si sigue provocando contra el Norte, este llegara a poseer las armas de exterminio masivo capaces de atacar hasta el territorio estadounidense".
					
					El comandante de la Comandancia Estrategica de EE.UU., quien controla las fuerzas armadas nucleares, dijo el dia 20 en la audiencia del Congreso Norteamericano que "parece que el Norte de Corea ya haya alcanzado exito en minimizar las armas nucleares". Sus palabras significan perfecto reconocimiento del fortalecimiento de las fuerzas disuasivas de la RPDC.
					
					Quien es acosado por el tiempo es precisamente la administracion Obama.
					
					EE.UU. debe tomar por si mismo una alternativa: la paz o la guerra.
					
					El tiempo y la victoria eterna estan al lado de nosotros.
					
					Recomendamos a la administracion Obama poner inmediato fin a las maniobras militares de agresion a la RPDC y abandonar todos los actos hostiles anti-RPDC.
